text.tspan: AVAILABLE SPRING 2018 - THE BODY DOUBLE YOUâ€™VE BEEN WAITING FOR
There are so many things that need to be done, and who has the time? What if
you could replicate yourself, and let that version of you do the yard work,
bathroom cleaning, and sit through boring meetings? Well, now you can!
Using our proprietary allellodecryptification process, your unique genetic code will
be copied and replicated using a special algorithmic, pseudo-phosphatase-based
solution. Then, after 10 short days, pick up your doppleganger and let the fun
begin! Pretend you are twins, play tennis against yourself, etc! Who needs friends
when you can literally hang out with you, the coolest person there is?
